title: Esmeralda Greene - Office Mating [ePub] - Traitor
description:
Esmeralda Greene takes a swing at extramarital flings in this entry in her "Greene Shorts" series of erotic short stories.

David never intended to have an affair. After all, his wife Annie is gorgeous, sexy and possessed of everything he could want in a spouse, including a powerful sex-drive. Sure, he's tempted by Kate, the vivaciously sexy woman who shares his office at work, but their flirtations are innocent. Neither one of them intends to embark on an affair.

But Kate and David are on the edge, and it only takes one unexpected spark to light the fuse to their explosive lust. As it turns out, it's David's wife who inadvertently provides that spark when she comes to his office and demands sex one Saturday afternoon, unwittingly putting on a live sex show in front of Kate.

It's a sexy and comical tale of voyeurism, exhibitionism, crossed purposes and passionate, freewheeling lust!

This story is included in "The Collected 'Greene Shorts' Volume 3"
